response.summary:
Knowledge gained from experience in customer service as a service engineer about heavy machinery industry, focus in agriculture, construction, petroleum, oil and gas industry; involved into the maintenance engineer, project management engineer, management workshop and sales environment.
Soft Skills acquired from experience in BBVA USA as a customer service agent, resolving issues for the US customers regarding credit card department. As a customer service agent, I worked closely with customers to resolve issues related to the credit card department, developing my skills in problem-solving, conflict resolution, and customer service. This experience has helped me to develop a keen understanding of the importance of customer satisfaction and the role it plays in the success of any organization.
Finally, I have also worked as a consultant engineer in the construction sector, where I have helped organizations to design and implement projects that meet their specific needs and goals. Through this experience, I have gained a deep understanding of the challenges and opportunities that come with working in this dynamic and constantly evolving industry.
Overall, I am a highly skilled professional with a wide range of technical and soft skills, including leadership, team building, customer service, and project management. I am committed to using my skills and experience to drive success for my team and the organizations I work with, and I look forward to the opportunity to contribute my expertise to new challenges and projects in the future.
response.skills: Spanish, Programming, Customer Support, English, Software Troubleshooting, Team Leadership, Technical Support, Project Management, Sales

company.name: Self Employed
company.description: Licensed and trained to provide independent contracting services. Where required professional licenses are valid in Florida, New York and Internationally. Financial , scuba and boating licenses are valid world wide. Have worked many years in various industries from grounds keeping, bee keeping, construction, law enforcement, private investigation, fire protection engineering, computer engineering, financial services, non-profit administration, tax preparation, accounting, janitorial services, boating and working as a dive master for scuba diving excursions. Have many licenses, have worked internationally and am now no longer looking for new positions/clients.
